DOC.brief_summary: BMS will conduct a regulatory postmarketing surveillance (PMS) to evaluate the safety of elotuzumab in clinical practice in Japan.
DOC.brief_title: Elotuzumab Safety Surveillance In Japanese Patients With Relapse Or Refractory Multiple Myeloma
DOC.criteria: All patients with relapsed or refractory multiple myeloma who are beginning to receive elotuzumab at the selected sites will be included in this surveillance study
